body:
I'm getting unusual rebuilding... some packages seem to want to install a new version every time I do a `spack install`, for no apparent reason.

In order to debug this, I would like a command flag on `spack spec` that display the hash code of each node in the DAG.  Then I can (for example) do a bunch of `spack spec` calls and see if/when the hashcode changes for certain dependencies.
title: Hash codes on `spack spec`
